# Subtitles

YouTube subtitle files, cleaned and organized by video.

## Structure

```
<Video Title>/
  *.en.vtt        # raw auto-generated subtitles from yt-dlp
  *.en.clean.vtt  # cleaned WebVTT (sentence-level cues, no rolling-window artifacts)
  *.en.srt        # cleaned SRT
  *.en.txt        # plain text transcript (no timestamps)
```

## Videos

- [The AI Agent Economy Is Here](./The%20AI%20Agent%20Economy%20Is%20Here/) â€” https://youtu.be/Q8wVMdwhlh4
